text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int num ; scanf ( "%d" , & num ) ; long int * array = ( int * ) malloc ( num * sizeof ( long int ) ) ; int index = 0 ; while ( index < num ) { scanf ( "%ld" , array + index ) ; index ++ ; } index = 0 ; long int cont = 1 ; long int cur_sum = 1 ; long int sum = 0 ; for ( ; index < num ; index ++ ) { if ( array [ index ] <= array [ index + 1 ] ) { cont += 1 ; cur_sum = cont * ( cont + 1 ) / 2 ; continue ; } else { cont = 1 ; sum += cur_sum ; } } printf ( "%ld\n" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
